query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as expense_count,
  SUM(amount) as total_expenses
FROM expenses 
WHERE farmId = 1 
AND DATE(expenseDate) >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01')
AND DATE(expenseDate) <= CURDATE()

FROM expenses

AND DATE(expenseDate) <= CURDATE()
